title: La Vida Mezcal
directions: Place ice into a cocktail shaker. Pour in tequila, mezcal, vermouth, and Campari. Add a dash of bitters, then stir or shake. Strain into a ice-filled rocks glass and garnish with a slice of orange.
ingredients: 3/4 fluid ounce bitter orange aperitif (such as Campari or Aperol)
